title: 3 Signs You're Not Ready to Get Married
subtitle: Recognize the important discussions and preparations to have before tying the knot.
content:
3 Signs You're Not Ready to Get Married

I'm Tyler, a former financial advisor and portfolio manager. I make financial content for free, so you don't have to pay for it.

1. You’ve Never Talked About Money

You’ve debated city versus country living, having kids versus being DINKs, and whether a hot dog is a sandwich. But heaven forbid you ask if they'd want a joint account or separate accounts!

2. You Plan to Figure It Out as You Go

Fun fact: no, you won’t. Going into a marriage without a plan regarding finances is a recipe for disaster.

3. Refusing to Sign a Prenup

You won't sign a prenup because you don’t want to bring a contract into the marriage. Remember, marriage itself is already a contract! It’s not just about finding the one; it’s about finding the person you still want to have coffee with after they buy a jet ski without discussing it with you.

Conclusion

If any of this is helpful, sign up for my free weekly newsletter by clicking the link in my bio.
